message.body: :( Kyle, my bfs parents who live in Mexico are only coming into the US for one weekend (this weekend) this year and they really want to meet me- would you mind if I either rescinded covering for you Saturday OR I take your Saturday but you take my Sunday?? I'm sorry, I forgot that this was the one weekend they will be in NY and it's apparently a big family deal bla bla
I can open Sunday. No problem, I just really don't see myself being able to function the day after the Xmas party.

Ha I totally understand. I'm sorry to do this but I have to be in NY Friday and Saturday and I can't just switch w Sunday. I truly am just finding this out now and I won't be at the Xmas party either. I didn't forget- my bf screwed up and told me the wrong dates that his mom and grandfather and father will be in the US and I really want to meet his family obv and tomorrow and this Sat are apparently my only chance. Thanks and I owe you.
Do whatever you want, I guess.
I'm not working Sunday.
Yes I know
Just wanted to clarify. Since, y'know, you didn't ask me to work Saturday, you just told me you weren't working it.
Wait
Haha
You asked if I wanted your Saturday shift so I said yes bc I did

Then last night I suddenly get told by my bf that he told me the wrong weekend dates and his family is coming This weekend from Mexico and his dying grandpa and bla bla and his mom planned us a whole weekend and blaaaaaaaa and so suddenly I was put in a super shitty situation- so I thought I could negotiate and just see his parents Sunday but no, his grandfather is only in the country Tomorrow and whatever
So I realized that I really couldn't cover for you Saturday after all bc ya I obv want the One chance to meet my bfs parents
Like I Never cancel or call in sick or anything ever
Never have since I started working at the last drop
But I'd call in sick or somethig for this bc it's super important
So if you want to just have me tell nam I agreed on sat but now can't
That's fine
But basically I also threw my besties birthday under the bus too
And also Brittany who suddenly I bailed on for two days
And everyone is mad at me but like I honestly am not going to miss the one chance to meet my dudes family since he just moved in w me
So I don't care how we do Saturday but I won't be here
You don't need to work sat is my point
I have worked at the last drop for a year and Never called sick
Never asked for a cover
Who do you think covers you if you call in sick tomorrow?!
I have worked at the last drop a year and never called in sick and never not shown up and never had an emergency and never canceled
You asked me to cover and I said sure and now I'm saying an emergency came up and I can't
It IS my responsibility
So that is fine but I cannot cover Saturday anymore
I will tell nam I agreed to cover your sat and screwed up and can't
That's my responsibility and fine
I don't need you to patronize me and teach me how to be responsible.
Whatever.
